author: danj
msg: Added check so that we don't try and parse Reporter component if it isn't there (it's not required by the WEF schema).
I also added a check to throw an exception if the Source component *isn't* there.

author: scotsmatrix
msg: Derby-1920: This patch improves the titles for the files in the Tools Guide. Patch derby-1920-tools2.diff contributed by Kim Haase.

author: asankha
msg: show how to use client authentication and hostname verification with a commented out sample parameter in the axis2.xml
update to set the content type header for messages going out through the nio transport

author: scotsmatrix
msg: DERBY-1920: This patch removes files that are 1-2 sentences only by moving the info into other files. This patch deletes 3 files and creates 1 new file.  Patch derby-1920-ref8.diff was contributed by Kim Haase.
